conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and how it will be directed into containers D, E, or F.
Baffle A is at the top left.
Baffle B is in the middle top.
Baffle C is in the top right.
Liquid from A will be directed by the baffle and will flow into container D.
Liquid from B will be directed by the baffle and will flow into container E.
Liquid from C will be directed by the baffle and will flow into container F.
Liquid from A will flow into container D.
Liquid from B will flow into container E.
Liquid from C will flow into container F.
